Posts.Content: On 2/17/2008 Sandyorganic wrote: I was diagnosed with breast cancer and liver disease at the same time.  My best option for the breast cancer was a mastectomy.  Because of my liver problem, I could not undergo further cancer treatment.  I turned to organic foods to try to heal my liver and fight cancer recurrence.  After 6 months on an all organic diet, my doctor took a series of blood tests.  The results:  my liver enzymes returned to normal, my overall cholesterol dropped 40 points, my good cholesterol rose 40 points, even my bad cholesterol dropped a few points.  I developed organic recipes high in antioxidants and immune boosters to help me fight cancer recurrence. You can find recipes on my website.  It's been 2 1/2 years since I began an all organic diet and I feel better than ever. Sandy Powers, www.organicforhealthsite.com  Thanks so much for posting that!!! I definately will check that out ;)
Posts.Title: Organic foods to stay healthy
